overview: Set near the turn of the 18th-century in China, thirteen women train to become nuns after they are ravaged by bandits. A mastery of kung fu is required before the women finish their training and after they leave the temple the nuns head out for chop-socky 3-D action.
tagline: If you've never seen a 3-D movie... why not see the best!
title: 13 Golden Nuns
